Seeds?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Mock: Seeds?
By danny on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 10:05 am:

i got my horn (suezo/tiger) to grade A 4th rank and the shop keeper didnt give me any seeds what do i need to do to get them?

By Daner on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 10:15 am:

I am not sure. Try to go to the item shop the whole month of February. If that does not work, try the item shop every week of a year. Do not, I repeat, DO NOT go above R4. It is impossible to get the seeds after that.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 10:59 am:

You have to visit the item shop a lot, during non-sale weeks.

By danny on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 01:15 pm:

on my last game i got them straight away

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 01:31 pm:

It's one of those random events that make the game harder in some ways, but also make it a lot more playable in the long run. If everything happened with set timing, then we'd all get less replay value out of it.

By Trickster on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 07:24 pm:

I've also seen it mentioned that you may only be able to get the seeds if you get to that rank in the first however many years of the game. I couldn't manage to get them in a game where I first reached that rank fairly later in the game, but in other games I've started where I've reached fourth rank fairly quickly, I've gotten the seeds fairly easily as well.

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, June 20, 2001 - 07:36 pm:

it seems as though the people who have had trouble with the seeds have either not gotten to rank 4 before 1020, or who blew right past rank 4 and got into higher ranks without visiting the shop much while they were there.

i say 'seems' because i am relying on memory of a few years of posts, and i am probably oversimplifying.

By scopedog on Thursday, June 21, 2001 - 07:22 am:

I'm not sure, but I remember reading in one of my Japanese MR books that you have to reach rank 4 before year 1010. I'll look it up when I get home tonight and report tomorrow.

By Anonymous on Thursday, June 21, 2001 - 02:06 pm:

on my old game i reached rank 4 in the year 1029 and got the seeds straight away

By scopedog on Friday, June 22, 2001 - 10:46 am:

OK, here's what my book says. Upon reaching rank 4, go to the item shop (*on a non-sale day*). Belte will have a new item: some seeds. The rest, as they say, is documented in the FAQ
